ygData.subject: justice has been served... by the ones being stolen from
ygData.messageBody:
> Well last night me and my friends were killing gnomes for about 3
> hours, then all of a sudden, a kill stealer we'd met in highkeep (which we
> reported and he got a warning for it) quite a few levels ago shows up and
> decides that he was going to take the gnome we just snared and nuked 2
> times. So i quickly run over to my druid that is pulling, charm the gnome
> over and over.... Oh dear, mr kill stealer which just blew all his mana
> seems pissed and is threatening to call a gm on us. By all means mr kill
> stealer, call a gm to report us for stealing our gnome back. Funny thing
> is
> that this guy allready got a warning in the past cause of the same
> situation
> in highkeep once and was talking to the guide for over an hour when that
> happened.
>
> He quickly left the zone after all this happened. Seems that no one
> wants to mess with a bard hehe. My friends love me now that im 32, with
> charm im the ultimate tool against want to be stealers, and i have mana
> regen now, life was sweet last night.
>
> Minkin
> Sol Ro
> lev 32 bard
>
> P.S. I wish there was Dark elf bards, because i love being evil
> sometimes
